This article is about the original Horicraft server. For its spiritual successor, see Horicraft (2).

Horicraft

Horicraft¬π (formerly known as the StuffyXP Minecraft Server) was a creative Minecraft server owned and operated by Nekori. It was initially announced by them on 3 December 2024, on the StuffyXP Hangout Discord Server, however it would only begin gaining significant popularity from late January 2025.

Main cities built in Horicraft include Horilandese cities like the capital Fucking or Jell. As the world spawn, Fucking is home to most of Horicraft‚Äôs players as well as facitilies like Dogui Heavy Industries Incorporated. Jell is mainly known for its tourist attraction, the B Parkour, shaped as a üÖ±Ô∏è cube.

Players of Horicraft can travel between Jell, Fucking, or other places across the Horicraft world using the Horicraft Underground Rail System (HURS, using minecarts), Horicraft Water Transportation System (HWTS, using boats), or using Nether Portals or pathes in cities by foot.

Horicraft officially shut down on 11 March 2025 after a disagreement between the server hoster and Nekori, after just over 3 months. Any instance of the original Horicraft that would remain open would no longer be official/endorsed by Nekori. It was later succeeded by Horicraft (2), a survival Minecraft server.

As of May 18 2025, Horicraft is planned to merge with Horicraft (2) in order to make a ‚Äú‚Äù"‚Äùnew‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù server as an attempt to keep both alive.
